verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329>, A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. In thee, O LORD <WH3068>, do I put my trust <WH2620>; let me never <WH408> <WH5769> be ashamed <WH954>: deliver <WH6403> me in thy righteousness <WH6666>.

Bow down <WH5186> thine ear <WH241> to me; deliver <WH5337> me speedily <WH4120>: be thou my strong <WH4581> rock <WH6697>, for an house <WH1004> of defence <WH4686> to save <WH3467> me. my: Heb. to me for a rock of strength
For thou art my rock <WH5553> and my fortress <WH4686>; therefore for thy name's <WH8034> sake lead <WH5148> me, and guide <WH5095> me.
Pull me out <WH3318> of the net <WH7568> that <WH2098> they have laid privily <WH2934> for me: for thou art my strength <WH4581>.
Into thine hand <WH3027> I commit <WH6485> my spirit <WH7307>: thou hast redeemed <WH6299> me, O LORD <WH3068> God <WH410> of truth <WH571>.
I have hated <WH8130> them that regard <WH8104> lying <WH7723> vanities <WH1892>: but I trust <WH982> in the LORD <WH3068>.
I will be glad <WH1523> and rejoice <WH8055> in thy mercy <WH2617>: for thou hast considered <WH7200> my trouble <WH6040>; thou hast known <WH3045> my soul <WH5315> in adversities <WH6869>;
And hast not shut me up <WH5462> into the hand <WH3027> of the enemy <WH341>: thou hast set <WH5975> my feet <WH7272> in a large room <WH4800>.
Have mercy <WH2603> upon me, O LORD <WH3068>, for I am in trouble <WH6887>: mine eye <WH5869> is consumed <WH6244> with grief <WH3708>, yea, my soul <WH5315> and my belly <WH990>.

For my life <WH2416> is spent <WH3615> with grief <WH3015>, and my years <WH8141> with sighing <WH585>: my strength <WH3581> faileth <WH3782> because of mine iniquity <WH5771>, and my bones <WH6106> are consumed <WH6244>.

I was a reproach <WH2781> among all mine enemies <WH6887>, but especially <WH3966> among my neighbours <WH7934>, and a fear <WH6343> to mine acquaintance <WH3045>: they that did see <WH7200> me without <WH2351> fled <WH5074> from me.
I am forgotten <WH7911> as a dead man <WH4191> out of mind <WH3820>: I am like a broken <WH6> vessel <WH3627>. a broken: Heb. a vessel that perisheth

For I have heard <WH8085> the slander <WH1681> of many <WH7227>: fear <WH4032> was on every side <WH5439>: while they took counsel <WH3245> together <WH3162> against me, they devised <WH2161> to take away <WH3947> my life <WH5315>.
But I trusted <WH982> in thee, O LORD <WH3068>: I said <WH559>, Thou art my God <WH430>.
My times <WH6256> are in thy hand <WH3027>: deliver <WH5337> me from the hand <WH3027> of mine enemies <WH341>, and from them that persecute <WH7291> me.
Make thy face <WH6440> to shine <WH215> upon thy servant <WH5650>: save <WH3467> me for thy mercies' <WH2617> sake.

Let me not be ashamed <WH954>, O LORD <WH3068>; for I have called <WH7121> upon thee: let the wicked <WH7563> be ashamed <WH954>, and let them be silent <WH1826> in the grave <WH7585>. silent: or, cut off for

Let the lying <WH8267> lips <WH8193> be put to silence <WH481>; which speak <WH1696> grievous <WH6277> things proudly <WH1346> and contemptuously <WH937> against the righteous <WH6662>. grievous: Heb. a hard thing

Oh how great <WH7227> is thy goodness <WH2898>, which thou hast laid up <WH6845> for them that fear <WH3373> thee; which thou hast wrought <WH6466> for them that trust <WH2620> in thee before the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>!

Thou shalt hide <WH5641> them in the secret <WH5643> of thy presence <WH6440> from the pride <WH7407> of man <WH376>: thou shalt keep them secretly <WH6845> in a pavilion <WH5521> from the strife <WH7379> of tongues <WH3956>.
Blessed <WH1288> be the LORD <WH3068>: for he hath shewed me his marvellous <WH6381> kindness <WH2617> in a strong <WH4692> city <WH5892>. strong: or, fenced

For I said <WH559> in my haste <WH2648>, I am cut off <WH1629> from before <WH5048> thine eyes <WH5869>: nevertheless <WH403> thou heardest <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of my supplications <WH8469> when I cried <WH7768> unto thee.

O love <WH157> the LORD <WH3068>, all ye his saints <WH2623>: for the LORD <WH3068> preserveth <WH5341> the faithful <WH539>, and plentifully <WH3499> rewardeth <WH7999> the proud <WH1346> doer <WH6213>.
Be of good courage <WH2388>, and he shall strengthen <WH553> your heart <WH3824>, all ye that hope <WH3176> in the LORD <WH3068>.
